Trigger.name: hide on death
Trigger.script: send("hide")

regexCodeList.string: ^(A|An) (.*) vanishes in the blink of an eye\!$
^You fail to step into the shadows\.$

Trigger.name: guards
Trigger.script: send("cast fear 2.temp") send("cast fear 2.temp")

Trigger.name: up
Trigger.script: expandAlias("sta")

Trigger.name: sing
Trigger.script: expandAlias("bardsing")

Trigger.name: refill canteens
Trigger.script: if Tank == gmcp.Char.Score.name or matches[2] == Tank then fillstring = "" expandAlias("refillwater") end

Trigger.name: refill canteens say
Trigger.script: fillstring = "" expandAlias("refillwater")

Trigger.name: hiding on off
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
if string.lower(matches[7]) == "on" then send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has hiding enabled.") enableTrigger("AutoHiding") send("hide") elseif string.lower(matches[7]) == "off" then send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has hiding disabled.") disableTrigger("AutoHiding") send("unhide") end end

Trigger.name: help
Trigger.script:
if (string.lower(matches[6]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4)) and (string.lower(matches[7]) == "help" or string.lower(matches[7]) == "status") then
expandAlias("standardhelp") expandAlias("standardhelpcaster") send("gstatus gtell/gstatus '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " hiding <on|off>'.") send("gstatus gtell/gstatus 'sing' for me to warm your ears.") send("gstatus tell me 'shields' for me to list all my leech commands.") send("cstatus tell me 'wardme' for me perform song of the ward and teleport myself to you (must have me consented).") end

Trigger.name: pfree or pfull
Trigger.script: expandAlias("sle")

Trigger.name: song of the ward
Trigger.script:
local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 lock.hair") send ("perform song of the ward " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put3 lock.hair")

Trigger.name: continual light
Trigger.script:
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.spell, "continual light"), db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})[1]
results.leeched = "yes" db:update(mydb.deathleech, results) echo("\ncontinual light releeched")
send ("wear shimmering.ball.mage-light") send ("wear golden.light")

Trigger.name: float
Trigger.script:
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.spell, "float"), db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})[1]
results.leeched = "yes" db:update(mydb.deathleech, results) echo("\nfloat releeched")

Trigger.name: mystic shield

local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.spell, "mystic shield"), db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})[1]
results.leeched = "yes" db:update(mydb.deathleech, results) echo("\nmystic shield releeched")

Trigger.name: haste
Trigger.script:
if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("put2 giant.rabbit") else expandAlias("put3 giant.rabbit") end
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.spell, "haste"), db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})[1]
results.leeched = "yes" db:update(mydb.deathleech, results) echo("\nhaste releeched")

local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.spell, "fire shield"), db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})[1]
results.leeched = "yes" db:update(mydb.deathleech, results) echo("\nfire shield releeched")

--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.spell, "sustenance"), db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})[1]
results.leeched = "yes" db:update(mydb.deathleech, results) echo("\nsustenance releeched")

Trigger.name: displace
Trigger.script:
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.spell, "displace"), db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})[1]
results.leeched = "yes" db:update(mydb.deathleech, results) echo("\ndisplace releeched")

Trigger.name: death
Trigger.script:
send("remove golden.ball") send("remove shimmering.ball") onDeath()
enableTrigger("DeathLeechSpells")
--BEGIN Set all leeched spells to not leeched --Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})
--Set leeched to "no" for all spells that I leech db:set(mydb.deathleech.leeched, "no", db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name))
--END Set all leeched spells to not leeched
tempTimer(10, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to stand.") send ("cstatus Attempting to stand.") send ("stand") ]])
tempTimer(15, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to go north one to death.") send ("cstatus Attempting to go north one to death.") send ("north & east") ]])
tempTimer(20, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to have death take me to Medienne.") send ("cstatus Attempting to have death take me to Medienne.") send ("to death med") ]])
tempTimer(25, [[ send ("gstatus Ok I should be in Medienne at the Crossroads.") send ("cstatus Ok I should be in Medienne at the Crossroads.") send ("gstatus Tell me or gtell 'reportpos' to confirm.") ]])
tempTimer(30, [[ send ("gstatus Please give me back all gear and have me wear everything before issuing the 'gtell " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " deathleech' command.") send ("cstatus Please give me back all gear and have me wear everything before issuing the 'gtell " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " deathleech' command.") ]])

Trigger.name: death leech
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
send("gstatus Attempting to releech now.") enableTrigger("DeathLeechSpells")
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from deathleech where character = '" .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. "' and leeched = 'no'" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.deathleech, mysql)
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if row.spell == "continual light" then expandAlias("get3 twist.wire") end if row.spell == "revitalize" then expandAlias("get3 troll.flesh") end if row.spell == "holy wrath" then expandAlias("get3 vial.oil.sac") end if row.spell == "sustenance" then expandAlias("get3 aster") end if row.spell == "float" then expandAlias("get3 feather.brown") end if row.spell == "displace" then expandAlias("get3 glass.prism") end if row.spell == "haste" then expandAlias("get3 giant.rabbit") end if row.spell == "fire shield" then expandAlias("get3 sulfur") end
send("cast " .. row.spell) end else send("gstatus All spells are releeched already.") disableTrigger("DeathLeechSpells") end end

Trigger.name: death leech - edit leeched spells
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
deathleechedit(matches[5]) end

Trigger.name: death leech list
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
deathleechlist() end

Trigger.name: death leech clear
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
deathleechclear()
end

Trigger.name: Join Group
Trigger.script:
Tank = gmcp.Group.leader myChar = gmcp.Char.Score.name send("opt autoloot 2") send("cstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has joined " .. Tank .. "'s group.") send("gstatus Gtell '" .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " help' to see my commands.") send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " hiding on") send("assist -a none")
disableTrigger("BardBots") disableTrigger("SpamSpells") disableTrigger("AllBots") disableTrigger("StableBots") disableTrigger("SpamMapForRepop") setMyConfiguration("hpmonitor", "0", "1") disableTimer("scanner")

Trigger.name: Disband
Trigger.script: Tank = gmcp.Char.Score.name myChar = gmcp.Char.Score.name send("group all") send("say " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " hiding off") send("opt autoloot 2") disableTrigger("BardBots") disableTrigger("SpamSpells") disableTrigger("AllBots") disableTrigger("StableBots") disableTrigger("SpamMapForRepop") disableTimer("scanner")

regexCodeList.string: ^You try to disband yourself, but fail miserably.$

Trigger.name: Stop Following
Trigger.script: send("cstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has left " .. Tank .. "'s group.") send("group all") Tank = gmcp.Char.Score.name myChar = gmcp.Char.Score.name send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " hiding off")

Trigger.name: identify - pouch of silver powder
Trigger.script: send ("gtell Missing a pouch of silver powder to cast identify. - Attempting to load one now.") expandAlias("get3 pouch.silver.powder")

regexCodeList.string: You need a pouch of silver powder to cast identify.

Trigger.name: magic mapping - pouch of faerie powder
Trigger.script: send ("gtell Missing a pouch of faerie powder to cast magic mapping. - Attempting to load one now.") expandAlias("get3 faerie.powder")

regexCodeList.string: You need a pouch of faerie powder to cast magic mapping.

Trigger.name: Create Food
Trigger.script: send("eat food") tempTimer(60,[[send("drop food & cast create food")]])

Trigger.name: Create Light
Trigger.script: send("drop ball.light") tempTimer(60,[[send("cast create light")]])

Trigger.name: Create Water
Trigger.script: send("empty vial") tempTimer( 60, [[send("cast create water vial")]] )

Trigger.name: mystic shield cast
Trigger.script: send("leech mystic shield")

Trigger.name: mystic shield faded
Trigger.script: send("cast mystic shield")

Trigger.name: detect magic cast
Trigger.script: send("leech detect magic")

Trigger.name: detect magic faded
Trigger.script: expandAlias("get3 glass.bead") send("cast detect magic") expandAlias("put3 glass.bead")

regexCodeList.string: You no longer see the working of magic.

Trigger.name: haste cast
Trigger.script: send("leech haste")

Trigger.name: haste faded
Trigger.script: send("cast haste")

regexCodeList.string: Your movements slow and the world returns to normal speed.

Trigger.name: heroism
Trigger.script: send("perform song of heroism")

regexCodeList.string: You feel merely mortal once again.

Trigger.name: fortitude
Trigger.script: send("perform song of fortitude")

regexCodeList.string: The toughness of heroes fades away.

Trigger.name: legends
Trigger.script: send("perform song of legends")

regexCodeList.string: The legends of heroes fade from your memory.

Trigger.name: sentinel
Trigger.script: send("perform song of the sentinel")

regexCodeList.string: The hum across your body subsides.

Trigger.name: morale
Trigger.script: send("perform song of morale")

regexCodeList.string: Your sharpened senses return to normal.

Trigger.name: wanderer
Trigger.script: send("perform song of wanderer")

regexCodeList.string: Your need to travel seems fulfilled for now.

Trigger.name: zeal
Trigger.script: send("perform song of zeal")

Trigger.name: mystics
Trigger.script: send("perform song of the mystics")

regexCodeList.string: The ancient knowledge fades from your memory.

Trigger.name: valor
Trigger.script: send("perform song of valor")

regexCodeList.string: The strength of ancient warriors fades away.

Trigger.name: grace
Trigger.script: send("perform song of grace")

regexCodeList.string: The keen grace of the ancients withdraws from you.

Trigger.name: fae
Trigger.script: send("perform song of the fae")

regexCodeList.string: You are free to summon aid.

Trigger.name: hummingbird
Trigger.script: send("perform song of the hummingbird")

Trigger.name: sonic combat
Trigger.script: send("cast combat")

regexCodeList.string: You feel less attuned for sonic combat.

Trigger.name: Fire Shield
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 pinch.sulfur") send ("cast fire shield " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put3 pinch.sulfur")

Trigger.name: Water Breathing
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 sea.shell") send ("cast water breathing " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put3 sea.shell")

Trigger.name: Displace
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 glass.prism") send ("cast displace " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put3 all.glass.prism")

Trigger.name: List of Commands
Trigger.script: send("group") send("tell "..matches[2].." Make sure we are both intro'd to each other.") send("tell "..matches[2].." Make sure we are both in the same room.") send("tell "..matches[2].." Tell me 'sing' for me to sing my songs.") send("tell "..matches[2].." Tell me 'fireme' for me to leech fire shield.") send("tell "..matches[2].." Tell me 'lightme' for me to leech continual light.") send("tell "..matches[2].." Tell me 'displaceme' for me to leech displace.") send("tell "..matches[2].." Tell me 'waterme' for me to leech water breathing.") send("tell "..matches[2].." Tell me 'reportpos' for me to report my position.")

Trigger.name: Continual Light
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 twist.wire") send ("cast continual light " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put3 all.twist.wire")
send ("cast create light") send ("give ball.light " .. oldmatches)

Trigger.name: sing
Trigger.script: expandAlias("unising")

Trigger.name: Leader blind unhide
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == gmcp.Group.leader then if table.contains(gmcp.Char.Status.flags,"hiding") then send("unhide") end end
